Articles.Content:
In the past i have managed to install mods correctly without using CKAN I recently came back to the game and wanted to make some space planes, upon failing to get the mods to work i install CKAN which took alot of liquiding around to get working. Now i have it installed and when i install my mods, they appear in the "GameData" folder but no sign of them in game.

I am running a steam version of the game. The mods im trying to install our:

Community Resource pack - RoverDude

Firespitter Core - RoverDude

OPT Space Plane Parts - Kyeon

RasterPropMonitor - MOARdV.Mihara

RasterPropMonitor Core - MOARdV.Mihara

Ive been struggling with this for 2 days, any help would be useful.

 

Long : https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B42ui2zsCSqgTndvbHpPMjN2UkU/view?usp=sharing

Edited October 22, 2017 by Commando115
